refsect1.title: What is Caja-Actions ?
refsect1.para: &prodname; is a &caja; extension whose principal function is to allow the user to add arbitrary actions to the file manager context menus. These actions may be organized in menus and submenus, exported and shared with other desktop environments.
&prodname; is compliant with DES-EMA specification. This means that actions and menus defined in &prodname; will be shareable with the compliant desktop environments.
